$interpreted: Jia-Shen: Hey-o, didn't waste me time gettin' up this early, got m' self a good ol' seat.
Jia-Shen: Today's Blessing Ceremony, lots of people means lots o' money!
Jia-Shen: This fella' ain't bringin' nothin' but trouble. Act like I don't see him, act like I don't see him.
Rune: It's you! You said before...countryside healing can heal wounds. Save Sanchez!
Jia-Shen: I'm sorry partner, you must be talkin' to the wrong fellar.
Rune: I know you. You're...the storytelling tortoise!
Jia-Shen: No no no no no. I'm just a simple ol' turtle that LOOKS like a tortoise. If you're looking for a tortoise, please head straight ahead and turn left. Have a nice day~
Rune: Straight ahead, turn left. Find storytelling tortoise. Save Sanchez...
Rune: Straight ahead, turn left. Find tortoise. Save Sanchez...
Jia-Shen: ......
Jia-Shen: Poop! I knew I shouldn't gotten up this early...
Jia-Shen: Lordie lord, I musta put some hurtin' on my ancestors in order to have gotten tangled up with you. Turn him 'round and put the injured down.
Jia-Shen: His injury...is too serious...that he has made it this far...is already a miracle...
Jia-Shen: No need to speak of country healing, even if I had me some magical medicine, there'd be no way to turn this 'round...
Rune: I don't understand...Sanchez, he...
Jia-Shen: I am afraid he ain't livin' long...it'd be best to bid him farewell...
Rune: No! Sanchez can't die! He will not die! He will not die! He will not die!
Sanchez: Trash face...
Sanchez: Devious put me through an experiment...I was never gonna live in the first place...
Sanchez: Something big is going to happen in this country...you've got to...get out...
Rune: No. Sanchez and I go together.
Sanchez: Dummy...I've sacrificed this useless life of mine...for your bright future...You want me to die for nothing...?
Rune: Sanchez...
Sanchez: Even if you've got to do whatever it takes, you've got to live for me...I know you can do it...aren't some people waiting for you?
Sanchez: ...So tired. I want to rest. Don't you wake me up now.
Sanchez: ...Bye, trash face...
Rune: Sanchez, open your eyes! Open your eyes!
Rune: Don't sleep...please...
Rune: You. Killed Sanchez.
Lazer: How ironic. The two slaves who escaped the Colosseum, in the end, couldn't escape the fate of killing each other.
Lazer: ...We really are quite similar.
Lazer: Come now. Let's end this.
Rune: You killed Sanchez. I'll kill you!
Rune: I'll kill you!!!
Lazer: (Is there no way I can get him on the defensive...? I guess I'll have to...)
Lazer: As expected...
Lazer: Is this...withered!?
Lazer: ——Sophie, is it? The Ringmaster of that circus.
Lazer: I've received news that the girl and her comrades are heading back to the Desert Kingdom right now.
Lazer: If you don't hurry, they'll all be destroyed, you know?
Lazer: I've dispatched my elite squad to take them out.
Lazer: However, you can choose to stay here and battle it out with me until you've gotten revenge for your friend. Then you can go pick up her corpse.
Lazer: Come on! Let's keep going!
Lazer: Hahahaha...even if she's saved it won't matter. In the end, she will die.
Lazer: The fate of this country has already been decided. You're just a pitiful insect trapped by the mirage...
Lazer: ...All I want is a future for that child...
Lazer: My mirage...

...All I want is a future for that child...
